headline: Strong Earnings for Apple Could Precede a Tariff Pummeling
summary: Apple  could report strong growth in quarterly sale as buyers try to avoid tariff-related price increases, but investors should remember the iPhone maker has a difficult couple of months ahead.  Apple is not only the largest company in the U.S. by market capitalization, it is among the leading tech businesses most likely to be directly hurt by President Donald Trump’s tariffs.  While Trump has placed heavy levies on Chinese imports, he has temporarily halted those on personal electronics like smartphones.

While Trump has placed heavy levies on Chinese imports, he has temporarily halted those on personal electronics like smartphones.

headline: How Warren Buffett's Portfolio Has Changed Drastically in Just 12 Months
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) portfolio has changed significantly over the past year, even though billionaire investor and company CEO Warren Buffett hasn't exactly been loading the company's portfolio with stocks.  Investors have been taking note of Buffett's seemingly conservative investment strategy and what it might mean.  Here are some of the most notable changes in Berkshire's portfolio this past year, and what, if anything, investors should read into these moves.
